title: Chocolate Spice Cookies
description: Basler Brunsli (Swiss traditional spiced chocolate cookies).

item3.ingredient: bittersweet chocolate, chopped or ~2/3 cup chocolate chips

instructions.step1: Process almonds and confectioners' sugar in a food processor until almonds are finely ground
instructions.step2: Add chocolate, 1/4 cup sugar, cocoa, cinnamon and salt. Process until chocolate is finely ground
instructions.step3: Add egg whites and vanilla, pulse until dough forms. Transfer dough to parchment paper and knead to form a smooth ball. Chill for 10 minutes until no longer sticky
instructions.step5: Roll dough to 1/4 inch thickness between two sheets of parchment paper
instructions.step6: Spread 1/2 cup sugar in shallow bowl
instructions.step7: Cut into stars and dip to coat both sides with sugar
instructions.step8: Place stars on parchment lined cookie sheet or silicon baking mat
instructions.step9: Bake for 12-15 minutes, cool on pan for 15 minutes and then move to cooling rack

notes: Egg yolks can be used to make egg yolk lemon cookies.

title: Egg Yolk Lemon Cookies

instructions.step2: Separately, beat 3 egg yolks, vanilla, lemon and orange extracts
instructions.step3: Combine butter and sugar mixture with egg mixture
instructions.step4: Separately, whisk flour, baking soda and cream of tartar
instructions.step5: Add flour mixture to combined butter and egg mixture. Make into a ball and chill for at least an hour
instructions.step7: Make 1 inch balls and drop onto greased cookie sheet or silicon baking mat
instructions.step8: Bake for 10-12 minutes, cool on pan for 2 minutes and then move to cooling rack

notes: Egg whites can be used to make granola and spiced pecans.

title: Andes Chunk Cookies
description: Mint chocolate chip cookies made with Andes mints.

instructions.step1: Combine flour and baking powders in a bowl
instructions.step2: Beat butter, sugars, vanilla and eggs until mixed
instructions.step3: Mix in Andes chunks, then flour mixture, form into a ball and chill for at least an hour
instructions.step5: Make 1 inch balls and drop onto greased cookie sheet or silicon baking mat
instructions.step6: Bake for 10-12 minutes, cool on pan for 2 minutes and then move to cooling rack

title: Loaded Banana Cake
description: Banana cake loaded with cranberries, chocolate chips and pecans

instructions.step1: Combine or sift flour and baking powders in a bowl
instructions.step2: Add remaining ingredients in 3 parts until just blended
instructions.step4: Place batter in a greased 8x8 pan

instructions.step1: Mix sugar and strawberries in a bowl and let rest for 30-60 minutes until juicy
instructions.step3: Pulse in a blender until desired consistancy, smooth or some strawberries chunks
instructions.step4: Chill for 30 minutes, pour into ice cream maker and follow manufacturer's directions

title: Butter Mochi
description: Hawaiian local-style treat made with coconut and butter in a rice flour base

instructions.step1: Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl
instructions.step2: In a blender mix liquid ingredients
instructions.step3: Pour into dry ingredients and wisk until smooth
instructions.step5: Place batter in a greased 13x9 glass pan
instructions.step6: Bake for 45-60 minutes, until toothpick comes out clean
instructions.step7: Let sit for 2-3 hours, cut and serve

instructions.step1: Combine flour and baking powders in a bowl
instructions.step2: Beat butter, sugar, vanilla and egg until mixed
instructions.step3: Stir in flour, chocolate chips and nuts
instructions.step5: Make 1 inch balls and drop onto greased cookie sheet or silicon baking mat
instructions.step6: Bake for 12-16 minutes, cool on pan for 2 minutes and then move to cooling rack

title: Banana Cranberry Cookies
description: Whole wheat banana cookies with cranberries

instructions.step1: Combine flour and baking powders in a bowl
instructions.step2: Beat butter, sugar, vanilla and egg until mixed
instructions.step3: Stir in flour, chocolate chips and nuts
instructions.step5: Make 1 inch balls and drop onto greased cookie sheet or silicon baking mat
instructions.step6: Bake for 12-16 minutes, cool on pan for 2 minutes and then move to cooling rack

title: Chocolate Crunchies
description: Deliciously crunchy chocolate treats for after dinner or with coffee.

item1.ingredient: crisp rice cereal, or corn flakes

instructions.step1: Melt dark chocolate in medium bowl, being careful to heat only enough to melt
instructions.step2: Add melting wafers and mix to melt, heating only if needed
instructions.step3: Combine dry ingredients, mix into chocolate until coated
instructions.step4: Pour onto parchment lined cookie sheet and spread evenly with spatula
instructions.step5: Place into fridge for about an hour until cooled
instructions.step6: Break into cookie sized pieces, keep refrigerated until served

notes: Cashews, pepitas and other nuts may be substituted or mixed with peanuts.

title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Toffee Bars
description: Also known as Death bars, best enjoyed straight from the freezer, or heated in the microwave for a few seconds

instructions.step2: In a mixing bowl combine peanut butter, sugar, egg and vanilla, beat lightly until just blended (do not over mix)
instructions.step4: Add toffee bits and chocolate chips
instructions.step5: Line 9x9 inch pan with foil, pour mixture into pan and smooth with spatula
instructions.step6: Bake for 20-22 minutes, cool and cut into bars

notes: That's right there is no flour in these.

title: Fudge Brownies
description: Decadent fudge brownies with chocolate chips and not too much butter.

instructions.step1: Grease a 8x2x2 inch baking pan, preheat oven to 350 degrees
instructions.step2: In medium bowl partially melt chocolate, add butter and finish melting, stir in sugar
instructions.step3: Add eggs and vanilla, beat lightly until just blended (do not over mix)
instructions.step4: Stir in flour, chocolate chips and nuts
instructions.step5: Spread batter in pan, bake for 30 minutes

title: Blonde Brownies
description: Blonde brownies with chocolate chips and not too much butter.

instructions.step1: Grease a 13x9x2 inch baking pan, preheat oven to 350 degrees
instructions.step2: In medium bowl combine flour, baking powder and salt
instructions.step3: Melt butter, stir in sugar, add eggs and vanilla, beat lightly until just blended (do not over mix)
instructions.step4: Stir in flour, chocolate chips and nuts
instructions.step5: Spread batter in pan, bake for 25 minutes
instructions.step6: Cut into bars while still warm

instructions.step1: Combine dry ingredients in a large mixing bowl
instructions.step2: Mix egg, brown sugar, oil, molasses and vanilla until smooth
instructions.step3: Add liquid mixture to dry ingredients and mix well, chill for several hours
instructions.step5: Make 1 inch balls and drop onto greased cookie sheet or silicon baking mat

instructions.step1: Combine dry ingredients in a large mixing bowl
instructions.step2: In a 2 cup measuring cup, lightly beat eggs, add oil and molasses, stir to combine
instructions.step3: Add liquid mixture to dry ingredients and mix well, chill for several hours
instructions.step5: Make 1 inch balls and drop onto greased cookie sheet or silicon baking mat
instructions.step6: Bake for 12-14 minutes, cool and coat with powdered sugar

title: Tahini Cookies

item5.ingredient: dried apricots, chopped, soaked and drained

instructions.step2: Combine tahini, honey, vanilla, cinnamon and dried fruit in a medium mixing bowl
instructions.step3: Mix in the nuts and seeds until well blended
instructions.step4: Make 1 inch balls, drop onto parchment lined cookie sheet and flatten lightly
instructions.step5: Bake for 10 minutes or until edges are slightly browned, cool for several minutes and then remove to wire rack

notes: Mix and match with cranberries, pepitas, or sunflower seeds.
